/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. A white pedestrian bridge arches over the street, providing a safe passage for pedestrians amidst the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
